services.name: Botox Treatment
services.description: Reduce fine lines and wrinkles with Botox. Results appear within 3-7 days and last 3-4 months.

services.name: Dermal Fillers
services.description: Hyaluronic acid fillers to restore volume and enhance contours. Results last 6-18 months.

services.name: Hydrafacial
services.description: Deep cleanse, exfoliate, and hydrate with vortex technology for instant glow.

services.name: Laser Hair Removal - Small Area
services.description: Permanent hair reduction for small areas like upper lip or chin.

services.name: Laser Hair Removal - Medium Area
services.description: Permanent hair reduction for medium areas like underarms or bikini.

services.name: Laser Hair Removal - Large Area
services.description: Permanent hair reduction for large areas like full legs or back.

services.name: IPL Photofacial
services.description: Treat sun damage, age spots, and redness with broad-spectrum light.

services.name: Chemical Peel - Light
services.description: Medical-grade light peel to improve texture and tone.

services.name: Chemical Peel - Medium
services.description: Medium-depth peel for more dramatic results.

services.name: Microneedling
services.description: Stimulate collagen production for smoother, firmer skin.

services.name: Microneedling with PRP
services.description: Enhanced microneedling with platelet-rich plasma for better results.

services.name: CoolSculpting - Single Area
services.description: Non-invasive fat reduction with controlled cooling. Results in 1-3 months.

services.name: CoolSculpting - Multiple Areas
services.description: Treatment for multiple areas in one session.
